resources.string: Seems that your device isn\'t properly rooted
You have to grant at least Storage and Contacts permissions to make t-ui work
t-ui has not the permissions to do this
Lock the screen on double tap
Can\'t toggle Airplane Mode on 4.2+ Android Version
Cant\'t write here. It\'s a file
The selected file is a directory
An unknown I/O error has occurred
This is the first song of the queue
Music folder doesn\'t exist, or doesn\'t contain mp3 files.\nYou should set a new one in the settings.txt file
Too many arguments, try passing only needed

Francesco Andreuzzi, ITA, Programmer, franzbianconero@gmail.com 

Luke Winward, USA, Designer 

Open Source Libraries: 
andre1299-comparestring 
andre1299-realtimetyping
Print assocs that are currently saved in \"yourmemory\"/t-ui/assoc.txt

Manage your apps 
Usage apps [option] [app name] 

[option] can be: 
-h [app name] -> hide the app 
-uh [app name] -> unhide the app 
-sh -> show hidden apps 
If there isn't any option, a list of apps will be returned 

Example: 
apps -h whatsapp 
hide whatsapp

Copy one or more files to a folder 
Usage: [su] cp [files] [folder] 

Example: 
su cp fool.txt fool2.png myFolder 
cp myFile.txt myFolder
Toggle mobile data. Will always turn off it if WiFi is active

Print a list of available commands at this moment, or informations about a command 
Usage: help command 

Example: 
help search

Install an apk 
Usage: install pathToApk 

Example 
install download/dropbox.apk

Move one or more files to a folder 
Usage: [su] mv [files] [folder] 

su mv fool.txt fool2.png myFolder 
mv fool.txt myFolder
Play the next track in the queue

Play a specific track 
Usage: listen trackname 

Example: 
play back in black 

(The track has to be located in your Music Folder)
Help T-UI with a positive rate (or negative, I don\'t know)\t;)
Uninstall t-ui automatically. \n\nMake sure you have another Launcher!
Restart t-ui and load modified values

Remove a file: 
Usage: [su] rm [files] 

Example: 

su rm fool.txt fool2.png 
rm Downloads/fool.txt

Search something somewhere 
Usage: search [option] something 

[option] can be: 
-g -> (Google Search) 
-p -> (Google Play Store) 
-f -> (Files) 
-y -> (YouTube) 

Example: 
search -p T-UI

Share a file 
Usage: share pathToFile 

Example: 
share fool.jpg
Print informations about the current track
Print all of the tracks in your music folder

Uninstall an application 
Usage: uninstall appName OR packageName 

Example: 
uninstall dropbox

Change the current directory 
Usage: cd path 

Example: 
cd /storage/sdcard1/DCIM

Open a file with the default application 
Usage: open pathToFile 

Example: 
open docs/fool.txt
